panels.description: Measures the rate at which a Kafka consumer is making fetch requests to the Kafka brokers.
panels.title: Fetch rate

panels.description: Monitor the rate at which Kafka consumers are consuming bytes from the Kafka brokers
panels.title: Consumed Bytes rate

panels.description: Measures the average fetch throttle time for Kafka consumers. The throttle time refers to the time the consumer spends waiting due to throttling enforced by Kafka brokers.
panels.title: Fetch Throttle

panels.description: Measures the average number of records that a Kafka consumer fetches per request from Kafka brokers
panels.title: Records per request

panels.description: Number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform per second.
panels.title: select rate
